name: GIDDY
description: Canada’s first commerce-backed Stabletokin. Minted to mirror $119.247B CAD held in cash as of January 31, 2025 (Source: Bank of Canada – Selected Monetary Aggregates). Anchoring gifting, redemption, and #MicroEconomies by OFiDCrypt, GIDDY models stablecoin/crypto parity with Bouncy Ball’s kinetic flow. Not legal tender at time of mint. Whimsical, practical, and proudly ours.
